Job Title: Software Engineer - MS Power Platform - Senior

Location: Sacramento, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
HTC Global Services wants you. Come build new things with us and advance your career. At HTC Global you'll collaborate with experts. You'll join successful teams contributing to our clients' success. You'll work side by side with our clients and have long-term opportunities to advance your career with the latest emerging technologies.

At HTC Global Services our consultants have access to a comprehensive benefits package. Benefits can include Paid-Time-Off, Paid Holidays, 401K matching, Life and Accidental Death Insurance, Short & Long Term Disability Insurance, and a variety of other perks.

We are looking for a skilled and experienced Senior Software Engineer with expertise in Microsoft Power Platform to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Power Platform, with demonstrated experience in setting up, configuring, and deploying complex automation solutions. The Senior Software Engineer will play a critical role in designing efficient workflows, integrating external systems, and optimizing processes to improve efficiency and productivity. If you have a passion for automation, excellent problem-solving skills, and a knack for innovation, we encourage you to apply.

Responsibilities

Set up and configure Microsoft Power Platform environments, including Power Automate, Power Apps, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.Define governance policies, security settings, data loss prevention (DLP) policies, and environment lifecycle management strategies for Power Platform deployments.Design, develop, and deploy complex automation solutions using Power Automate, leveraging features such as triggers, actions, conditions, loops, and error handling.Integrate Power Automate with external systems, databases, APIs, and cloud services using integration patterns and techniques.Configure and use Power Automate connectors for popular applications and services like Microsoft Office 365, SharePoint, Dynamics 365, Salesforce, and Azure services.Design efficient and scalable workflows and automation processes adhering to best practices and design patterns.Analyze business requirements, model workflows, define automation logic, and optimize processes for improved efficiency and reliability.Extend the capabilities of Power Automate through custom connectors, expressions, functions, and custom actions using Microsoft Power Platform SDKs and development tools.Integrate custom code or external services within Power Automate workflows to address specific business requirements or extend platform functionality.Manipulate and transform data within Power Automate workflows using data manipulation techniques and data transformation capabilities.Implement security measures, role-based access controls, and data protection mechanisms to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of sensitive information.Troubleshoot and debug Power Automate workflows, identifying and resolving errors, exceptions, and performance issues.Use monitoring tools, logs, and diagnostic features within Power Automate to diagnose problems, analyze execution flows, and optimize workflow performance.Document Power Automate workflows, automation logic, configurations, and integration requirements in a clear and concise manner.Proactively assess innovative solutions, experiment with new features, and collaborate on using emerging technologies to enhance business processes and productivity

Qualifications

3+ years of experience in setting up and configuring Microsoft Power Platform environments.In-depth understanding of Power Apps and Power Automate capabilities, connectors, and components.Proficiency in designing and developing complex automation solutions using Power Apps and Automate.Strong knowledge of integration patterns and techniques for connecting Power Automate with external systems.Knowledge of security best practices and compliance standards related to data privacy and access control.Proficiency in troubleshooting and debugging Power Apps and Power Automate workflows.Strong documentation skills and ability to document Power Apps and Power Automate workflows and configurations.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field preferred.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
